metadata.title: Summer is coming | Aakash Gupta | Stand-up Comedy
metadata.description:
India Tour 2025 Tickets Link : https://linktr.ee/theskygupta 
Come watch me perform live in your city :) 

Want early invites for all my shows? 
Give me your info: https://forms.gle/aYNHP2ZZVNxKJiBs8

In this video I share my experience & stories about struggles during Indian summers

Written & Performed by - Aakash Gupta
Follow me on Instagram : @theskygupta

 Venue : The laugh Store, Gurgaon
